title: Let's Talk About the Rumble Changes
body: Is the change to Rumble's Flamespitter significant or not? In case, people ask what Rumble change, Rumble's Flamespitter does 100% magic damage against minions instead of 50% magic damage.

replies.body: It should be very noticeable as a top lane Rumble.  Last hitting and pushing should be easier. There are drawbacks, though: you're going to likely be subject to more ganks.
